Name: sabnzbd-extended
Overview: SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. SABnzbd takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.[br]

Audio Post Processor: Target Format.Name: Audio Post Processor: Target Format
Audio Post Processor: Target Format.Description: FLAC or OPUS or MP3 or AAC or ALAC - converts lossless FLAC files to set format

Audio Post Processor: Target Format Bitr.Name: Audio Post Processor: Target Format Bitrate
Audio Post Processor: Target Format Bitr.Description: Set to desired bitrate when converting to OPUS/MP3/FDK-AAC/AAC format types

Audio Post Processor: Verify Downloaded.Name: Audio Post Processor: Verify Downloaded Tracks
Audio Post Processor: Verify Downloaded.Description: TRUE = ENABLED, Verifies FLAC/MP3 files for errors (fixes MP3's, deletes bad FLAC files)

Audio Post Processor: Detect Single File.Name: Audio Post Processor: Detect Single File Albums
Audio Post Processor: Detect Single File.Description: TRUE = ENABLED :: Detects single file albums and mark download as failed if detected

Audio Post Processor: Replaygain FLAC ta.Name: Audio Post Processor: Replaygain FLAC tagging
Audio Post Processor: Replaygain FLAC ta.Description: TRUE = ENABLED, adds replaygain tags for compatible players (FLAC ONLY)

Audio Post Processor: Require Audio Qual.Name: Audio Post Processor: Require Audio Quality Match
Audio Post Processor: Require Audio Qual.Description: true = ENABLED :: Verifies files match desired Target Format file extension

Audio Post Processor: Beets Tagging.Name: Audio Post Processor: Beets Tagging
Audio Post Processor: Beets Tagging.Description: TRUE = ENABLED :: Enables tagging with Beets

Video Post Processor: Require Audio/Subt.Name: Video Post Processor: Require Audio/Subtitle Language
Video Post Processor: Require Audio/Subt.Description: true = enabled, disables/enables checking video audio/subtitle language based on VIDEO_LANG setting

Video Post Processor: Audio/Subtitle Lan.Name: Video Post Processor: Audio/Subtitle Language
Video Post Processor: Audio/Subtitle Lan.Description: Default: eng :: Set to required language (ISO 639-2 language code), if not found, will mark as failed

Video Post Processor: Process with MKV C.Name: Video Post Processor: Process with MKV Cleaner
Video Post Processor: Process with MKV C.Description: TRUE = Enabled :: Uses MKVToolNix to remove unwanted audio/subtitle streams and sets UND audio language based on Required Audio/Subtitle Language setting

Video Post Processor: Encode with Sickbe.Name: Video Post Processor: Encode with Sickbeard MP4 Automator (SMA)
Video Post Processor: Encode with Sickbe.Description: TRUE = Enabled :: Uses SMA to process incoming video files

Video Post Processor: Tag with Sickbeard.Name: Video Post Processor: Tag with Sickbeard MP4 Automator (SMA)
Video Post Processor: Tag with Sickbeard.Description: TRUE = Enabled :: Uses SMA to Tag MP4 files (Enabled SMA process: manual.py -a; Disabled SMA Process: manual.py -nt)
